about_the_game:
An erotic/ comedy visual novel, centered around a day in the life of a busty cow-girl who has a severe crush on her younger male caretaker.

If you are looking for a high quality, funny, and sexy story world, set in a “slice of life” fantasy farm, this is a game for you!




Sally,  a cow-human hybrid girl, is one of many creatures owned by Farmer Edmund. She is a milkmaid, but has “special status” among the other creatures of the farm, as she is quite beautiful. Ed treats her as his personal companion pet.

Ed’s young nephew Jimmy works on the farm, as it’s mostly a family affair. He has come of age and is beginning to take notice of the voluptuous Sally. His uncle has tasked him with tending to her, but this may prove to be problematic.

Can Sally resist Jimmy’s crush for her? 







SALLY
Sally was bread for her beauty and her capacity to provide milk. A mainstay on the farm for some years now, Sally enjoys a life of leisure, aside from her occasional duties as a milkmaid. Despite her more or less comfortable life, she longs for adventure and excitement! For now, she’ll have to settle for country life, and try and stop her eyes from wandering to the farm’s “forbidden fruits”.

JIMMY
Jimmy has been tasked with tending to Sally, but this has proven to be difficult given the rising sexual frustrations and curiosities he’s experiencing since he's come of age. He has developed desires for a nurturing woman, and this has heightened his curiosity in Sally and her comforting allure. 

EVA
She is a sassy little creature who likes to wander the farm in search of occasional mischief. As an indoor/outdoor pet, she enjoys more freedoms than most of the people and creatures on the property. Eva’s job is that of a simple pet, although Sally suspects that Ed is beginning to favor her.

FIONA
Fiona is an experienced farmhand. She’s a friend to the family and lives on a ranch about 2 miles from the farm. Aside from being a horse expert, she is an experienced  “jack of all trades” and is quite useful around the grounds. Her love for equine creatures is obvious, as she spends a good amount of her time tending to the prize horses. 

DASH
The farm is home to a trio of horse-human hybrid stallions that are prized for their impressive... 
physiques! Dash is their leader. These beasts are held in high esteem and often take precedent of the other creatures of the farm, much to Sally's dismay.



HD 1080p & Fullscreen options
Visual Novel/ Point and click
25+ illustrated scenes
CG Gallery
Extras and secrets
Dress-up “photo booth” gallery
Original Soundtrack and audio
All the characters are over 18 years old

content_descriptors.notes: This game has adult themes, language, and fictional characters depicted in sexual situations. All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo T5250
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: My Breast Friend Sally

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Window 10 64-bit +
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Window 10 64-bit +
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD Ryzen 2.9GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD RX 560 2GB equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card

short_description: An erotic/ comedy visual novel, centered around a day in the life of a busty cow-girl who has a severe crush on her younger male caretaker. Experience a fully voiced story a point and click exploration of the farm, and many unlockables
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Italian, Korean
*languages with full audio support
